emails.subject: Proposal for Client X
emails.body:
Dear Client X,

Thank you for your interest. Attached is our comprehensive proposal covering all features, timelines, and pricing.

emails.subject: Re: Proposal for Client X
emails.body: Thank you for the detailed proposal. We have a few questions regarding timeline adjustments.

emails.subject: Re: Proposal for Client X - Timeline
emails.body:
Hello,

We can adjust the timeline to meet your deadlines. Please see the revised schedule in the attachment.

emails.subject: Re: Proposal for Client X - Finalizing
emails.body: The revised schedule works. Please send the final contract.

emails.subject: Final Contract Attached
emails.body:
Dear Client X,

Attached is the final contract. Let me know if you need any further changes.

Best regards,
Sales Team
